DECK.  132. SURVEY NUMBER
BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE*  01. PRIVATE 02. PRIVATE 1ST CLASS 03. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 04. CORPORAL 05. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 06. BUCK SERGEANT 07. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 08. STAFF SERGEANT 09. TECH SERGEANT 10. MASTER SERGEANT OR 1ST SERGEANT 00. NO ANSWER

Q.2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THAT RANK OR GRADE*  1. LESS THAN 1 MONTH UP TO 2 MONTHS 2. OVER 2 MONTHS UP TO 3 MONTHS 3. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 4. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 5. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 6. OVER 1 YEAR 7. I HAVE ALWAYS BEEN A PRIVATE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 YEARS 04. 21 YEARS 05. 22 YEARS 06. 23 YEARS 07. 24 YEARS 08. 25 YEARS 09. 26 YEARS THRU 29 YEARS 10. 30 YEARS THRU 34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OLDER 00. NO ANSWER

Q.4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.5. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY* P. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 5 YEARS 6. OVER 5 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.6. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY WERE YOU IN BEFORE YOU LEFT YOUR OLD OUTFIT OVERSEAS*  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED COMMAND 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY 09. ANTI-AIRCRAFT 10. AIR CORPS 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. TANK DESTROYER 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

Q.7. HOW LONG WERE YOU OVERSEAS*  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 4. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.8. WHAT OVERSEAS AREA OR THEATRE WERE YOU SHIPPED FROM JUST BEFORE YOU CAME BACK TO THE U.S.*  1. NATOUSA (ITALY, NORTH AFRICA) 2. ETO (BRITISH ISLES) 3. CARIBBEAN 4. SOUTH PACIFIC 5. CENTRAL PACIFIC (HAWAII, ETC.) 6. ALASKA 7. CHINA-BURMA-INDIA 8. SOME OTHER THEATER 9. SOUTHWEST PACIFIC 0. NO ANSWER

Q.9A. HAVE YOU RECEIVED ANY OF THE FOLLOWING DECORATIONS*  1. NO DECORATIONS RECEIVED 2. YES, PURPLE HEART 3. YES, SILVER STAR 4. YES, DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 5. YES, PURPLE HEART AND SILVER STAR 6. YES, PURPLE HEART AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 7. YES, SILVER STAR, AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 8. YES, PURPLE HEART, SILVER STAR, AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 9. YES, OTHER (NOT COMBINATIONS OF ANY ABOVE) 0. NO ANSWER

Q.9B. HAVE YOU BEEN RECOMMENDED FOR ANY DECORATIONS YOU HAVE NOT YET RECEIVED*  01. NO DECORATIONS RECEIVED 02. YES, PURPLE HEART 03. YES, SILVER STAR 04. YES, DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 05. YES, PURPLE HEART AND SILVER STAR 06. YES, PURPLE HEART AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 07. YES, SILVER STAR AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 08. YES, PURPLE HEART, SILVER STAR AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 09. YES, OTHER (NOT COMBINATIONS OF ANY ABOVE) 10. YES, NO DECORATION NAMED 00. NO ANSWER

Q.10. WHAT WERE YOU ATTACHED TO OVERSEAS WHEN YOU WERE TOLD YOU WERE COMING BACK TO THE U.S.*  1. I WAS ON DUTY WITH MY REGULAR OUTFIT 2. I WAS ON DETACHED SERVICE 3. I WAS IN A REPLACEMENT DEPOT OR CASUAL COMPANY 4. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER
Q.11. DID YOU COME BACK UNDER THE ROTATION PLAN*  1. YES 2. NO 3. I DON,T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

Q.14. WHAT DAY DID YOU LAND IN THE U.S.* GIVE THE EXACT DATE YOU ACTUALLY GOT OFF THE BOAT IN THE U.S.  01. 1 DAY OR LESS 02. OVER 1 DAY UP TO AND INCLUDING 2 DAYS 03. OVER 2 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 3 DAYS 04. OVER 3 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 4 DAYS 05. OVER 4 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 5 DAYS 06. OVER 5 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 6 DAYS 07. OVER 6 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 7 DAYS 08. OVER 7 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 10 DAYS 09. OVER 10 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 20 DAYS 10. OVER 20 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 60 DAYS 11. OVER 60 DAYS 00. NO ANSWER

Q.15A. TO WHAT DEBARKATION CENTER (STAGING AREA) DID YOU GO AFTER YOU LANDED IN THE U.S.*  1. KILMER, NEW JERSEY 2. JACKSON BARRACKS, LOUISIANA 3. HAMPTON ROADS, VIRGINIA (PATRICK HENRY) 4. HOSPITAL 5. SEATTLE, WASHINGTON 6. AIR FIELD 7. NEW YORK 8. SAN FRANCISCO (MCDOWELL) 9. MISCELLANEOUS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.15B. HOW MANY DAYS WERE YOU THERE*  01. 1 DAY OR LESS 02. OVER 1 DAY UP TO AND INCLUDING 2 DAYS 03. OVER 2 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 3 DAYS 04. OVER 3 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 4 DAYS 05. OVER 4 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 5 DAYS 06. OVER 5 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 6 DAYS 07. OVER 6 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 7 DAYS 08. OVER 7 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 8 DAYS 09. OVER 8 DAYS UP TO AND INCLUDING 9 DAYS 10. OVER 9 DAYS 00. NO ANSWER

Q.16. WERE YOU TOLD OFFICIALLY WHY YOU WERE KEPT AT THE DEBARKATION CENTER AS LONG AS YOU WERE*  1. YES, AND THE REASONS WE WERE GIVEN WERE GOOD ONES 2. YES, BUT I DON,T THINK THE REASONS GIVEN WERE GOOD ONES 3. NO, NO ONE EXPLAINED TO US WHY WE WERE THERE AS LONG AS WE WERE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.17. WERE THERE ENOUGH INTERESTING THINGS FOR YOU TO DO AT THE DEBARKATION CENTER SO THAT YOU DIDN,T JUST HAVE TO SIT AROUND*  1. YES 2. NO, BUT I DIDN,T MIND SITTING AROUND SOME 3. NO, AND IT GOT PRETTY TIRESOME SITTING AROUND 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 18 NOT CODED.

Q.19. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DO YOU WISH THE ARMY HAD TOLD YOU ABOUT OR MORE ABOUT AT THE DEBARKATION CENTER*  1. ABOUT WHAT WE HAD TO GO THROUGH BEFORE GOING ON OUR FURLOUGH 2. ABOUT THE ASSIGNMENTS WE MIGHT GET AFTER OUR FURLOUGH 3. ABOUT WHAT HAS BEEN HAPPENING ON THE HOME FRONT SINCE WE LEFT THE U.S. 4. COMBINATION OF 1 AND 2 5. COMBINATION OF 2 AND 3 6. COMBINATION OF 1 AND 3 7. COMBINATION OF ALL THREE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.20. WHAT SORT OF TRIP DID YOU HAVE FROM THE DEBARKATION CENTER TO THIS RECEPTION STATION*  1. IT WAS COMFORTABLE ENOUGH 2. IT WAS PRETTY UNCOMFORTABLE, BUT I DIDN,T MIND MUCH 3. IT WAS VERY UNCOMFORTABLE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.21. IS THIS RECEPTION STATION THE ONE YOU FIRST CHOSE TO COME TO WHILE YOU WERE OVERSEAS, OR DID YOU CHOOSE SOME OTHER RECEPTION STATION*  1. THIS IS THE ONE I CHOSE 2. I CHOSE SOME OTHER RECEPTION STATION 0. NO ANSWER

Q.22. HOW MUCH PAY (LESS DEDUCTIONS FOR BONDS, ALLOTMENTS, ETC.) DID YOU HAVE COMING TO YOU WHEN YOU ARRIVED AT THIS RECEPTION STATION*  01. $20.00 OR LESS 02. OVER $20 UP TO AND INCLUDING $30 03. OVER $30 UP TO AND INCLUDING $40 04. OVER $40 UP TO AND INCLUDING $50 05. OVER $50 UP TO AND INCLUDING $60 06. OVER $60 UP TO AND INCLUDING $80 07. OVER $80 UP TO AND INCLUDING $100 08. OVER $100 UP TO AND INCLUDING $150 09. OVER $150 UP TO AND INCLUDING $200 10. OVER $200 UP TO AND INCLUDING $300 11. OVER $300 12. DON,T KNOW 00. NO ANSWER

Q.23. COUNTING THE PAY YOU WILL GET HERE AND THE OTHER MONEY YOU HAVE WITH YOU, DO YOU EXPECT TO HAVE ENOUGH MONEY FOR YOUR FURLOUGH OR DELAY EN ROUTE*  1. YES 2. NO, (NO AMOUNT GIVEN) 3. NO, $20 OR LESS 4. NO, OVER $20 UP TO AND INCLUDING $30 5. NO, OVER $30 UP TO AND INCLUDING $50 6. NO, OVER $50 UP TO AND INCLUDING $70 7. NO, OVER $70 UP TO AND INCLUDING $100 8. NO, OVER $100 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 24 NOT CODED.

Q.25. AFTER YOUR FURLOUGH YOU WILL BE GOING TO A REASSIGNMENT CENTER. HAVE YOU BEEN TOLD WHAT PROCESSING YOU WILL GO THROUGH THERE BEFORE GETTING A PERMANENT ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, I WAS GIVEN A GOOD IDEA 2. YES, I WAS TOLD A LITTLE ABOUT IT 3. NO, I WASN,T TOLD 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 26 NOT CODED.

Q.27. HOW MUCH HAVE YOU WORRIED ABOUT THE KIND OF ASSIGNMENT YOU WILL GET AFTER YOUR FURLOUGH HERE IN THE STATES*  1. I HAVE WORRIED A GOOD DEAL ABOUT IT 2. I HAVE WORRIED SOME ABOUT IT 3. I HAVE NEVER WORRIED AT ALL ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER
Q.28. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN TOLD OFFICIALLY YOU WOULD BE ASSIGNED TO DUTY AT A STATION NEAR YOUR HOME*  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER

Q.29. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT SERVING OVERSEAS AGAIN, AFTER YOU,VE HAD YOUR FURLOUGH*  01. I WILL WANT TO GET OVERSEAS AGAIN AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 02. I,LL BE READY TO GO WHENEVER I,M NEEDED 03. I,D LIKE TO STAY IN THE U.S. FOR A FEW MONTHS, BUT THEN I,LL BE READY TO GO ANYWHERE 04. I DON,T WANT TO GO OVERSEAS AGAIN (NO REASON GIVEN) 05. HAVE DONE MY SHARE; BEEN OVER LONG ENOUGH; LET SOMEBODY ELSE GO (NO INDICATION HE WOULD BE WILLING TO GO OVER AGAIN) 06. SAME AS "5" BUT INDICATES WILLINGNESS TO GO OVER AGAIN IF NECESSARY 07. COULDN,T TAKE IT AGAIN; IT,S TOO TOUGH; DANGEROUS; IT,S NO GOOD; NOT FIT (NO MENTION OF PHYSICAL OR MENTAL CONDITION) 08. PHYSICALLY UNFIT; TOO OLD; LIMITED SERVICE 09. MENTALLY UNFIT 10. HOME AND FAMILY REASONS 11. ALL OTHER COMMENTS 00. NO ANSWER

Q.30. DO YOU BELIEVE THERE ARE ENOUGH ENLISTED MEN STILL IN THE U.S. WHO HAVEN,T YET BEEN OVERSEAS, SO THAT RETURNING OVERSEAS VETERANS WON,T NEED TO GO OVERSEAS AGAIN*  1. YES, I BELIEVE THERE ARE ENOUGH 2. NO, I DON,T BELIEVE THERE ARE ENOUGH 3. I,M NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.31. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JOB*  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.32. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS*  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.33. DO YOU FEEL YOU WILL NEED MEDICAL ATTENTION BEFORE YOU WILL BE IN SHAPE TO TAKE UP A PERMANENT ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, I WILL NEED A GOOD DEAL OF MEDICAL ATTENTION 2. YES, I WILL NEED SOME MEDICAL ATTENTION 3. NO, I WON,T NEED ANY MEDICAL ATTENTION 4. I,M NOT SURE 5. I EXPECT TO BE DISCHARGED INSTEAD OF BEING GIVEN ANOTHER PERMANENT ASSIGNMENT 6. COMBINATION OF 1 AND 5 7. COMBINATION OF 2 AND 5 8. COMBINATION OF 3 AND 5 9. COMBINATION OF 4 AND 5 0. NO ANSWER

Q.34. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU,VE DONE IN THIS WAR*  1. I FEEL I,VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE AS A SOLDIER 2. I FEEL I,VE PROBABLY DONE MY SHARE, BUT I,M READY TO DO MORE WHEN I,M NEEDED 3. I FEEL I,VE DONE A LITTLE, BUT NO SOLDIER CAN SAY HE HAS DONE HIS SHARE UNTIL THE WAR IS OVER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.35. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT BEING AWAY FROM YOUR OLD OUTFIT*  1. I MISS BEING WITH MY OLD OUTFIT VERY MUCH 2. I MISS BEING WITH MY OLD OUTFIT SOME 3. I DON,T MISS BEING WITH MY OLD OUTFIT VERY MUCH 4. I DON,T MISS BEING WITH MY OLD OUTFIT AT ALL 5. I,M STILL WITH MY OLD OUTFIT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.36. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARMY*  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHER WAYS, NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVE NOT GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 37 NOT CODED.
